name: Time Hole Hunters
description:
First student project, made on the first semester.

Navigate through obstacles in hopes of getting through as many time holes as you can. Raise against the clock as you try too make each trip before you run out of fuel. Utilize Passive and Active powers to make it through tough situations.

  • 4 Buttons: Up to Accelerate, Left/Right to Steer and Down to use Active Powers.
  • Endless Game: There is no end, go as long as you can with progressively longer and denser stages. And up to a limit, new obstacles.
  • Customization: 6 Skins, 3 Engines, 2 Passive and 2 Active powers. Each changes both the look and stats of the rocket.

Current version; 0.81 [Updated 1.10.2021]

This game may or may not receive further updates.
